name: chatgpt-initial-chat-title-updater
description: Updates the document title with the initial chat title in ChatGPT upon opening the page.

scripts.package: rm -f pacakge.zip && yarn build && zip -r package.zip . -x '.git/**' './node_modules/**' 'yarn*' '*.ts' '.idea/**' 'tsconfig.json' 'package.json' '.gitignore'

author: Your Name
